_comment: Claude Code MCP Configuration Template for SDL-MCP

_documentation.purpose: Configure SDL-MCP as an MCP server for Claude Code
_documentation.placement: Use `claude mcp add-json` or merge into ~/.claude.json under `mcpServers`

windowsNotes.paths: Use forward slashes (/) or escaped backslashes (\\)
windowsNotes.npx: npx works cross-platform. For global install, use 'node' with full path
windowsNotes.environment: SDL_CONFIG_PATH or SDL_CONFIG must be set to point to your sdlmcp.config.json

quoting.powerShell: Single quotes work for paths, double quotes for variable expansion
quoting.cmd: Use double quotes for all paths with spaces

workspaceFolder.description: Replaced by Claude Code with the current workspace root
workspaceFolder.windows: Resolves to forward-slash path on all platforms

env._comment_env: Alternative: Set SDL_CONFIG_PATH if you prefer environment variable name

_alternative_global_install.description: If you installed SDL-MCP globally with 'npm install -g sdl-mcp':

_alternative_windows_direct_node.description: Windows alternative using direct Node invocation (if npx is unavailable):
